#Valkyrie, Tier 3
##Playing as a Valkyrie Your whole arsenal of abilities change upon choosing this strain. You will be able to heal upon hitting any host. You additionally receive a fury reservoir which is needed for the activation of certain Abilities. You will lose your Tail Stab in exchange for another ability, Water Fountain.
Stick behind your sisters as Valkyrie, you play a supportive role with your pheromones and retrieve, if your sisters are stunned, then use your Fight or Flight to save them.
##Abilities: - [bold][color=green]PASSIVE[/color][/bold]: Your slashes lifesteal and heal any sisters nearby you during the attack, this amount is boosted during Tantrum. - [bold]Tail Fountain[/bold]: It's a single target extinguish with a relatively short cooldown which can be used to put out fires on both xenonids and hosts. Useful for saving near death xenonids or captures from fire.
- [bold]Tantrum[/bold]: Used on a sister, to enhance your and their defense temporarily. Additionally, it doubles the healing you get on target hit. Exceptions to this are Ravager and Crusher as they get a speed buff instead during the duration of Tantrum.
- [bold]High Gallop[/bold]: Stomps on hosts and grenades. Hosts will be temporarily stunned on the ground. Grenades can be thrown back a couple of tiles in the direction of your cursor upon Ability usage.
- [bold]Fight or Flight[/bold]: Upon usage, it will remove any debuffs from fellow xenonids, including stun, slow and daze. Its effective range can further be enhanced by having the same amount of fury you need for this ability left upon usage. Due to its hefty costs in fury, plasma and long cooldown, it is advised to use it sparingly.
- [bold]Retrieve[/bold]: Saves xenonids from a distance by dragging them into safety. This uses half of your fury to reel in a Xeno in dire need of help. It may not work on certain caste while they stand up - mainly Queen and Crusher - meaning they need to lay down or be in critical health.
- [bold]Emit Pheromones[/bold]: Emits one of the three pheromones, strength of said pheromone is dependant on caste and does not stack with pheromones of the same type.
